trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicy class represents the extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ExtendedProtectionPolicy representa a política de protecção expandida utilizada pelo servidor para validar as ligações de cliente recebidos.

trans-unit.source: Any classes that expose the ExtendedProtectionPolicy class should not allow the setting of null policies, should supply a default policy, or should require an explicit policy to be created and set by the application developer or administrator.
trans-unit.target: As classes que expõem a classe de ExtendedProtectionPolicy não devem permitir a definição das políticas nulo, deve fornecer uma política predefinida, ou deve solicitar a uma política de explícita a ser criado e definida pelo administrador ou programador da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> classe que especifica quando deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é utilizado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>propriedade está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro e a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valor que indica se deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the required data to populate the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> classe a partir de um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados necessários para preencher o <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName> interface for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>interface para a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>classe.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A> method can be used to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A>método pode ser utilizado para serializar um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This serialized object can then be used with ExtendedProtectionPolicy to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: Este objecto serializado, em seguida, pode ser utilizado com ExtendedProtectionPolicy para construir um novo <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information that is required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem da sequência serializada que estão associada com o novo <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced and the channel binding token (CBT) to be used.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> classe que especifica quando a política de protecção expandida deve ser imposta e o token de enlace de canal (CBT) a ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property is set to the `customChannelBinding` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é utilizado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>propriedade está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro, a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>propriedade está definida como o `customChannelBinding` parâmetro e a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valor que indica se deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>que contenha um enlace de canal personalizado para utilizar para a validação.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: policyEnforcement is specified as .
trans-unit.target: policyEnforcementestá especificado como .

trans-unit.source: customChannelBinding is .
trans-unit.target: customChannelBinding is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> classe que especifica quando deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida, o tipo de proteção imposta pela política e uma lista de nome de fornecedor de serviço (SPN) personalizado que é utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é utilizado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>propriedade está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro, a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A>propriedade está definida como o `protectionScenario` parâmetro e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A>propriedade está definida como o `customServiceNames` parâmetro.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valor que indica se deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém a lista SPN personalizada que é utilizada para correspondência de SPN um cliente.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: policyEnforcement is specified as .
trans-unit.target: policyEnforcementestá especificado como .

trans-unit.source: customServiceNames is or an empty list.
trans-unit.target: customServiceNames é ou uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> classe que especifica quando deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida, o tipo de proteção imposta pela política e uma lista de nome de fornecedor de serviço (SPN) personalizado que é utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é utilizado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>propriedade está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro, a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A>propriedade está definida como o `protectionScenario` parâmetro e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A>propriedade está definida como o `customServiceNames` parâmetro.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valor que indica se deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"> </xref> que contém a lista SPN personalizada que é utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: policyEnforcement is specified as .
trans-unit.target: policyEnforcementestá especificado como .

trans-unit.source: customServiceNames is or an empty list.
trans-unit.target: customServiceNames é ou uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom channel binding token (CBT) to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um token de enlace de canal personalizado (CBT) para utilizar para a validação.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property represents a custom channel binding token to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só de leitura representa um token de enlace de canal personalizado para utilizar para a validação.

trans-unit.source: This is used in advanced scenarios when the CBT is provided by a custom outer channel.
trans-unit.target: Isto é utilizado em cenários avançados durante o CBT é fornecido por um canal personalizado externo.

trans-unit.source: An example scenario might use this property in combination with <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário de exemplo poderá utilizar esta propriedade em combinação com <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>e <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>que contenha um enlace de canal personalizado para utilizar para a validação.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o personalizado fornecedor nome serviço (SPN) lista utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só de leitura indica a lista SPN personalizada que é utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: By default, the server will determine a default SPN list according to its registered endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o servidor irá determinar uma lista SPN predefinido, de acordo com os pontos finais registados.

trans-unit.source: For scenarios which require SPN checking, this property can be specified using a using a constructor to override the default list used to match against the client’s SPN.
trans-unit.target: Para cenários que requerem a verificar o SPN, esta propriedade pode ser especificada utilizando um utilizando um construtor para substituir a lista de predefinido utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"> </xref> que contém a lista SPN personalizada que é utilizada para correspondência de SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o sistema operativo suporta a autenticação integrada do windows com a proteção expandida.

trans-unit.source: The changes to support extended protection are currently available for applications on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para suportar a proteção expandida estão atualmente disponíveis para aplicações no Windows 7 e Windows Server 2008 R2.

trans-unit.source: The extended protection features will be made available as updates for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.
trans-unit.target: As funcionalidades de proteção expandida serão disponibilizadas como atualizações para o Windows Vista e Windows Server 2008.

trans-unit.source: The extended protection features are not available on earlier versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: As funcionalidades de proteção expandida não estão disponíveis em versões anteriores do Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sistema operativo suporta autenticação integrada do windows com a proteção expandida, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Obtém quando deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates when extended protection policy should be enforced (always, when supported by clients, or never).
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só de leitura indica quando deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida (sempre, quando suportado pelos clientes ou nunca).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valor que indica se deve ser imposta a política de protecção expandida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de proteção imposta pela política de proteção expandida.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só de leitura indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the required data to serialize an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto com os dados necessários para serializar um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ISerializable.GetObjectData method can be used to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: O método ISerializable.GetObjectData pode ser utilizado para serializar um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: This serialized object can then be used with <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: Este objecto serializado, em seguida, pode ser utilizado com <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>para construir um novo <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized data for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados serializados para um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém o destino de fluxo serializado que estão associado com o novo <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation for the extended protection policy instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma representação de cadeia para a instância da política de proteção expandida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> instance that contains the representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>instância que contém a representação do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.String>
